internship.description: Help with arranging, preparing, and carrying out several facets of live performances. Get familiar with artist management, backstage coordination, and event planning.

backupdancer.description: Your energy and style on stage as a backup dancer will lift the entire performance. Collaborate together with fellow dancers and choreographers to craft fascinating routines that astonish the audience.

backstagecrew.description: You'll play a key role in making sure shows go smoothly as a member of the backstage crew. To ensure a flawless performance, coordinate with performers, set up and take down equipment, and oversee props. You need to be meticulous and have a strong interest in the magic that occurs behind the scenes.

choreographer.description: As a choreographer, you will create captivating movements that serve as the performance's heartbeat. Work together with dancers and artists to realize ideas so that each movement is a work of art.

eventcoordinator.description: Your job as an event coordinator is to plan flawless events. Oversee the logistics, communicate with the performers, and make sure everything is in place for a spectacular evening. It all comes down to transforming concepts into enduring reality.

makeupartist.description: Your job as an event coordinator is to plan flawless events. Oversee the logistics, communicate with the performers, and make sure everything is in place for a spectacular evening. It all comes down to transforming concepts into enduring reality.

talentmanager.description: As a talent manager, you will find, develop, and mentor artists as they pursue fame. You'll design your gifted protégés' success, from negotiation prowess to strategic planning.

musicvideodirector.description: Transform stories into fascinating visuals in your role as a music video director. Create, plan, and oversee music videos that visually captivate people while enhancing the artist's message.

producer.description: Create the sounds, vibes, and beats that will characterize the upcoming sensation in music production. Work together with a variety of skills to create sound magic that attracts listeners throughout the world. Your production skills will be the key to creating K-Pop's catchy beats and memorable songs.
